# Fire of Entanglement (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Special; see text

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Reflex partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 221

The next creature you attack using your smite evil class ability is wreathed in flames that impede its movement. Until the end of the spellâ€™s duration, the target is [[Entangled|entangled]]. If the target starts its turn in a square adjacent to you, it is considered to be [[Entangled|entangled]] to an immobile object (you) and cannot move. A target that saves against this spell is affected for only 1 round.
